articles.description: Sweden-based assistive technology maker Tobii Dynavox on Monday announced the TD Pilot, an all-new augmentative communications device designed for eye-tracking.
articles.content:
The TD Pilot uses the 12.9" iPad Pro as the centerpiece of the communications device. 
Tobii Dynavox
